project.card

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.card.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbilityCard, RegCard

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single playing card.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Card.ability
      Enumerated type that lists the many types of Card abilities.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String name,
    int cost,
    java.lang.String image,
    java.lang.String d,
    Card.ability a)
        Initializes a standard Card, initializes global variable abilityUsed to false
        Parameters:
        name - the Card's name
        cost - the Card's cost, taken from the Player's wcp resource
        image - the String representing a Card's image path
        d - the description of the ability
        a - the implementation of the ability enumerated type
